title: Adamant dagger

properties.value: The adamant dagger is a dagger made of adamantite. It can be created by using one Adamant bar and a hammer on an anvil at level 70 Smithing, granting 62.5 Smithing experience.

The adamant dagger is a dagger made of adamantite. It can be created by using one Adamant bar and a hammer on an anvil at level 70 Smithing, granting 62.5 Smithing experience.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The position of the weapon and its variants on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

26 February 2015
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Adam dagger(p+)" to "Adamant dagger(p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Adam dagger(p++)" to "Adamant dagger(p++)".
22 August 2006
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Adamant dagger(+)" to "Adam dagger(p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Adamant dagger(s)" to "Adam dagger(p++)".

The '''adamant dagger''' is a [[dagger]] made of [[adamant equipment|adamantite]]. It can be created by using one [[Adamant bar]] and a [[hammer]] on an [[anvil]] at level 70 [[Smithing]], granting 62.5 Smithing [[experience]].
